name: Pokémon Adventures Red Chapter
overview: Description: This hack attempts to follow the Pokémon Adventures manga closely, including nearly every event. Some events were altered in order to make them longer. The game has won third place in the PokeCommunity Hack of the Year contest in 2013, 2014 and 2015. Features: • Updated graphics • Red, Green, Blue and Yellow playable • Character customization • Mugshots • Day and night system • Multiple regions • New battle backgrounds • New music • Level cap raised to 255 • Physical/Special split • Reusable TMs • EV & IV stat checker • Mega Evolution & Primal Reversion • Battle Bond • Fusion Pokémon
